result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Matter scheduled for Plea Hearing.  

AS TO COUNT 1:  Pursuant to plea negotiations, and on state's motion, Court orders case dismissed but read into case 22CM1561 for the purposes of sentencing.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Due to a scheduling error, Court will reschedule case.  Parties emailed new court date.  Case adjourned for Plea and Sentencing Hearing on 10/21 at 3:00 pm, Courthouse Room 501.

Defendant Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris appeared by video.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for a bail/bond hearing. Defense counsel withdraws his bail motion. Case remains calendared as previously set in Branch 41.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris not in court, in custody.  Attorney Matthew V Plummer appeared by video for Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests bail review hearing and plea and sentencing hearing.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

Court ordered no contact with MAM (DOB 6/19/92)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris in court with attorney Heather L. Johnson.  Defendant Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris in custody.  Arthur Kenneth Thexton appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Katrawn Deshawn Lee Harris appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Skwierawski, Branch 41.  Court reviewed the complafint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Status conference scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 08:30 am.
